items.title: Awesome Json
items.content_text:
### Applications

*   [Visual JSON (‚≠ê302)](https://github.com/youknowone/VisualJSON) - simple JSON pretty-viewer for Mac OS X. (inactive)

### Format Extensions

*   [NDJSON (‚≠ê751)](https://github.com/ndjson/ndjson-spec) (Newline delimited JSON) - a standard for delimiting JSON in stream protocols.

### Transformations

*   [deepjson](https://www.npmjs.com/package/deepjson/) - A better way to load big json config files. (node.js)
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Magento2
items.content_text:
### Front-ends

*   **Alokai** (*ex: Vue Storefront*) ([github.com/vuestorefront/vue-storefront (‚≠ê11k)](https://github.com/vuestorefront/vue-storefront))
*   **ScandiPWA** ([github.com/scandipwa/scandipwa (‚≠ê553)](https://github.com/scandipwa/scandipwa))
*   **Breeze Evolution** ([breezefront.com](https://breezefront.com/themes)) - A 100 pagespeed score frontend theme that is compatible with all Luma-based extensions.
*   **Front-Commerce** ([front-commerce.com](https://www.front-commerce.com/))- Front-Commerce is an innovative, advanced, ready-to-use PWA (Progressive Web App) front-end solution developed in France for Magento stores.
items.content_html:
Front-ends

  • Alokai (ex: Vue Storefront) (github.com/vuestorefront/vue-storefront (‚≠ê11k))
  • ScandiPWA (github.com/scandipwa/scandipwa (‚≠ê553))
  • Breeze Evolution (breezefront.com) - A 100 pagespeed score frontend theme that is compatible with all Luma-based extensions.
  • Front-Commerce (front-commerce.com)- Front-Commerce is an innovative, advanced, ready-to-use PWA (Progressive Web App) front-end solution developed in France for Magento stores.

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [git-plugin (dark-kitt) (‚≠ê0)](https://github.com/dark-kitt/zsh-git-plugin) - `git` integration that displays the current directory and `git` branch.
*   [git-plugin (rcruzper) (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/rcruzper/zsh-git-plugin) - Adds some functions for `git`.
*   [nvim-appname (‚≠ê26)](https://github.com/mehalter/zsh-nvim-appname) - Maintain multiple Neovim configurations with `NVIM_APPNAME` with full tab completion of available flags, available neovim applications, and neovim arguments/flags. Requires neovim v0.9+
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • git-plugin (dark-kitt) (‚≠ê0) - git integration that displays the current directory and git branch.
  • git-plugin (rcruzper) (‚≠ê7) - Adds some functions for git.
  • nvim-appname (‚≠ê26) - Maintain multiple Neovim configurations with NVIM_APPNAME with full tab completion of available flags, available neovim applications, and neovim arguments/flags. Requires neovim v0.9+

items.title: Awesome Keycloak
items.content_text:
### Community, SIGs, Discussion Forums and Mailing Lists

*   [Inactive - Keycloak Developer Chat](https://keycloak.zulipchat.com)
*   [GitHub Discussions (‚≠ê28k)](https://github.com/keycloak/keycloak/discussions)
*   [CNCF Slack](https://slack.cncf.io/), [#keycloak](https://cloud-native.slack.com/archives/C056HC17KK9), [#keycloak-dev](https://cloud-native.slack.com/archives/C056XU905S6)

### Articles

*   [Writing Keycloak Extensions: Key Concepts and Anti-Patterns](https://www.zone2.tech/blog/writing-keycloak-extensions-key-concepts-and-anti-patterns)
*   [Keycloak Multi-Tenancy and the Pulumi Automation API: Part 1](https://www.zone2.tech/blog/keycloak-multi-tenancy-and-the-pulumi-automation-api-part-1)
*   [Instant User Management, SSO, and Secure Pages for ReactJS](https://dev.to/phasetwo/instant-user-management-sso-and-secure-pages-for-reactjs-with-keycloak-4hej)
*   [Securing a Next.js Application with Keycloak](https://dev.to/phasetwo/securing-a-nextjs-application-with-keycloak-gm3)
*   [Django Web Authentication with Keycloak](https://dev.to/phasetwo/django-web-authentication-with-keycloak-3hl2)

### Video Playlists

*   [KeycloakDevDay 2024 by dasniko](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lQH-yNrF_As\&list=PLNn3plN7ZiaqXjiDSB1KDaF3bCDuQmDgw)

### Community Extensions

*   [Email Notifications when login from a new IP and Login History (‚≠ê7)](https://github.com/eliskachylikova/keycloak-extensions)
*   [Keycloak Authenticator for Duo's Universal Prompt (‚≠ê54)](https://github.com/instipod/DuoUniversalKeycloakAuthenticator)

### Integrations

*   [Keycloak Provider for Laravel's Socialite Plugin](https://socialiteproviders.com/Keycloak/)
*   [mantelo (Python Admin Client) (‚≠ê27)](https://github.com/derlin/mantelo)

### Docker

*   [Keycloak with CRDB Support](https://quay.io/repository/phasetwo/keycloak-crdb) ([CockroachDB](https://www.cockroachlabs.com/))

### Tools

*   [Keycloak RestAPI Postman Collection](https://www.postman.com/mverma99/workspace/my-workspace/collection/25610427-e8685d30-4671-45fe-812e-ca10dba1df28)

### Example Projects

*   [FIDO2 with Keycloak for 1FA and 2FA christian-2/oidc-passkey (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/christian-2/oidc-passkey)
*   [A simple Django app to use Keycloak over OIDC by Amsterdam/keycloak\_oidc (‚≠ê24)](https://github.com/Amsterdam/keycloak_oidc)
items.content_html:
Community, SIGs, Discussion Forums and Mailing Lists

  • Inactive - Keycloak Developer Chat
  • GitHub Discussions (‚≠ê28k)
  • CNCF Slack, #keycloak, #keycloak-dev

Articles

  • Writing Keycloak Extensions: Key Concepts and Anti-Patterns
  • Keycloak Multi-Tenancy and the Pulumi Automation API: Part 1
  • Instant User Management, SSO, and Secure Pages for ReactJS
  • Securing a Next.js Application with Keycloak
  • Django Web Authentication with Keycloak

Video Playlists

  • KeycloakDevDay 2024 by dasniko

Community Extensions

  • Email Notifications when login from a new IP and Login History (‚≠ê7)
  • Keycloak Authenticator for Duo's Universal Prompt (‚≠ê54)

Integrations

  • Keycloak Provider for Laravel's Socialite Plugin
  • mantelo (Python Admin Client) (‚≠ê27)

Docker

  • Keycloak with CRDB Support (CockroachDB)

Tools

  • Keycloak RestAPI Postman Collection

Example Projects

  • FIDO2 with Keycloak for 1FA and 2FA christian-2/oidc-passkey (‚≠ê3)
  • A simple Django app to use Keycloak over OIDC by Amsterdam/keycloak_oidc (‚≠ê24)

items.title: Awesome Quant
items.content_text:
### Python / Financial Instruments and Pricing

*   [pynance (‚≠ê382)](https://github.com/GriffinAustin/pynance) - Lightweight Python library for assembling and analyzing financial data.
*   [hasura/base-python-dash](https://platform.hasura.io/hub/projects/hasura/base-python-dash) - Hasura quick start to deploy Dash framework. Written on top of Flask, Plotly.js, and React.js, Dash is ideal for building data visualization apps with highly custom user interfaces in pure Python.
*   [hasura/base-python-bokeh](https://platform.hasura.io/hub/projects/hasura/base-python-bokeh) - Hasura quick start to visualize data with bokeh library.

### Python / Trading & Backtesting

*   [AutoTrader (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/kieran-mackle/AutoTrader) - A Python-based development platform for automated trading systems - from backtesting to optimization to livetrading.
*   [OctoBot Script (‚≠ê31)](https://github.com/Drakkar-Software/OctoBot-Script) - A quant framework to create cryptocurrencies strategies - from backtesting to optimization to livetrading.

### Python / Risk Analysis

*   [FinQuant (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/fmilthaler/FinQuant) - A program for financial portfolio management, analysis and optimization.

### R / Numerical Libraries & Data Structures

*   [sparseEigen (‚≠ê13)](https://github.com/dppalomar/sparseEigen) - Sparse principal component analysis.

### Reproducing Works, Training & Books / Data Visualization

*   [Python\_Option\_Pricing (‚≠ê762)](https://github.com/dedwards25/Python_Option_Pricing) - An library to price financial options written in Python. Includes: Black Scholes, Black 76, Implied Volatility, American, European, Asian, Spread Options.
*   [101\_formulaic\_alphas (‚≠ê27)](https://github.com/ram-ki/101_formulaic_alphas) - Implementation of [101 formulaic alphas](https://arxiv.org/ftp/arxiv/papers/1601/1601.00991.pdf) using qstrader.
items.content_html:
Python / Financial Instruments and Pricing

  • pynance (‚≠ê382) - Lightweight Python library for assembling and analyzing financial data.
  • hasura/base-python-dash - Hasura quick start to deploy Dash framework. Written on top of Flask, Plotly.js, and React.js, Dash is ideal for building data visualization apps with highly custom user interfaces in pure Python.
  • hasura/base-python-bokeh - Hasura quick start to visualize data with bokeh library.

Python / Trading & Backtesting

  • AutoTrader (‚≠ê1.2k) - A Python-based development platform for automated trading systems - from backtesting to optimization to livetrading.
  • OctoBot Script (‚≠ê31) - A quant framework to create cryptocurrencies strategies - from backtesting to optimization to livetrading.

Python / Risk Analysis

  • FinQuant (‚≠ê1.6k) - A program for financial portfolio management, analysis and optimization.

R / Numerical Libraries & Data Structures

  • sparseEigen (‚≠ê13) - Sparse principal component analysis.

Reproducing Works, Training & Books / Data Visualization

  • Python_Option_Pricing (‚≠ê762) - An library to price financial options written in Python. Includes: Black Scholes, Black 76, Implied Volatility, American, European, Asian, Spread Options.
  • 101_formulaic_alphas (‚≠ê27) - Implementation of 101 formulaic alphas using qstrader.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### General / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular-imask (‚≠ê5.1k)](https://github.com/uNmAnNeR/imaskjs/tree/master/packages/angular-imask) - Angular input mask.
*   [ngx-mask (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/JsDaddy/ngx-mask) - Angular Plugin to make masks on form fields and html elements.
*   [maskito (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/taiga-family/maskito) - Collection of libraries to create an input mask which ensures that user types value according to predefined format.

### Form Controls / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng-select (‚≠ê3.4k)](https://github.com/ng-select/ng-select) - All in One UI Select, Multiselect and Autocomplete.
*   [file-input-accessor (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/jwelker110/file-input-accessor) - Angular directive that provides file input functionality in Angular forms.

### Validation / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-formcontrol-errors (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/dgonzalez870/ngx-formcontrol-errors) - A directive for showing errors in Angular form controls.

### Misc Components / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ng-lock](https://www.npmjs.com/package/ng-lock) - Angular decorator for lock a function and user interface while a task running.
*   [microwave (‚≠ê263)](https://github.com/jscutlery/devkit/tree/main/packages/microwave) - Optimize Angular change detection effortlessly.

### RxJS / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [operators (‚≠ê263)](https://github.com/jscutlery/devkit/tree/main/packages/operators) - This package regroups a couple of RxJS operators meant to simplify some common patterns.
items.content_html:
General / Google Developer Experts

  • angular-imask (‚≠ê5.1k) - Angular input mask.
  • ngx-mask (‚≠ê1.2k) - Angular Plugin to make masks on form fields and html elements.
  • maskito (‚≠ê1.5k) - Collection of libraries to create an input mask which ensures that user types value according to predefined format.

Form Controls / Google Developer Experts

  • ng-select (‚≠ê3.4k) - All in One UI Select, Multiselect and Autocomplete.
  • file-input-accessor (‚≠ê29) - Angular directive that provides file input functionality in Angular forms.

Validation / Google Developer Experts

  • ngx-formcontrol-errors (‚≠ê1) - A directive for showing errors in Angular form controls.

Misc Components / Google Developer Experts

  • ng-lock - Angular decorator for lock a function and user interface while a task running.
  • microwave (‚≠ê263) - Optimize Angular change detection effortlessly.

RxJS / Google Developer Experts

  • operators (‚≠ê263) - This package regroups a couple of RxJS operators meant to simplify some common patterns.
